item.title: Three More Ways To Make Your Office More Efficient
item.description: In today’s corporate culture, green practices aren’t just about protecting the environment and driving sustainability â€” increasing efficiency in your place of business can actually have a direct impact on your company’s bottom line. Implementing just a few changes as part of your facility management plan can make a major difference in your company’s profitability. Most importantly, it doesn’t take a giant (read: expensive) initiative to start swinging the efficiency pendulum in your favor.
